column4: My computer was not powered off correctly (power loss). Now when booting I'm just starting at the Ubuntu logo. Is there a Key Combination I can press to view a console log of what it is doing right now?
I'd like to see the boot process. My guess is it's doing a disk check or something
i would try f2, ctrl-alt-f1, ctrl-alt-f2 in that order
tried those, none of them worked
